Name: Leather Dice Bag - Blue
Description: Forged in the hue of a clear midnight sky, this pouch feels as though it was stitched from the very cloak of a storm-sorcerer. It is the perfect vessel for dice that carry the chill of frost or the crackle of lightning.
Product Dimensions: 12.5 cm x 10 cm - holding approximately 35 dice

Name: Canvas Dice Bag - Brown
Description: Woven from the thick, sun-bleached fibers of a seasoned traveler’s tent. This rugged pouch is built to withstand the grit of the road, keeping your dice dry and secure whether you are trekking through mud-slicked lowlands or dusty trade routes.
Product Material: 100% Heavy-Duty Cotton Duck Canvas  (Exterior and Interior) / Braided Jute (Drawstring)
Product Dimensions: 14 cm x 11 cm - holding approximately 55 dice

Name: Velvet Dice Bag - Celestial
Description: Woven from threads of captured starlight and midnight silk, this pouch hums with the quiet energy of the cosmos. It is the favored vessel for those who draw their power from the heavens or seek to influence the very threads of fate.
Product Dimensions: 15 cm x 12 cm - holding approximately 50 dice

Name: Velvet Dice Bag - Stag
Description: Embossed with the image of the Great Forest King, this emerald-toned velvet bag carries the scent of pine and ancient magic. It is a noble choice for the warden or druid who views their dice as sacred seeds of destiny.
Product Dimensions: 15 cm x 12 cm - holding approximately 50 dice

Name: Velvet Dice Bag - Dragon
Description: Clad in the regal texture of a Great Wyrm’s underbelly, this pouch is designed to protect a hoard of any size. It carries an air of ancient power, perfect for the player who intends to dominate the battlefield with fire and fury.
Product Dimensions: 15 cm x 12 cm - holding approximately 50 dice

Name: Velvet Dice Bag - Illithid
Description: A pouch that seems to shimmer with a strange, oily iridescence, reminiscent of the depths of the Underdark. It is a chilling home for dice that deal in psychic whispers and secrets best left unspoken.
Product Dimensions: 15 cm x 12 cm - holding approximately 50 dice

Item: Bag - Kharki Green Leather Dice Bag
Name: Leather Dice Bag - Kharki
Description: This rugged hide bears the weathered tone of the high mountain trails. Built for the long haul, it is an essential piece of kit for the scout or wanderer who needs their lucky stones to stay silent and secure while trekking through the brush.
Product Dimensions: 12.5 cm x 10 cm - holding approximately 35 dice

Name: Leather Dice Bag - Brown
Description: A classic relic of the Old World, this bag smells of ancient libraries and tavern hearths. Its rich, earthen leather is a staple for any seasoned adventurer, looking better with every battle scar and gold coin it carries.
Product Dimensions: 12.5 cm x 10 cm - holding approximately 35 dice

Item: Bag - Moon and Stars Dice Bag
Name: Velvet Dice Bag - Moon and Stars
Description: Adorned with the silver icons of the night sky, this velvet bag serves as a tiny sanctuary for your dice. It feels as soft as a cloud and is said to grant a lunar blessing to any roll made in the dark of night.
Product Dimensions: 15 cm x 12 cm - holding approximately 50 dice

Name: Velvet Dice Bag - Funghi
Description: Sprouting from the damp corners of an enchanted grove, this whimsical bag is a tribute to the strange magic of the earth. It is the perfect home for dice that carry the unpredictable and transformative power of nature.
Product Dimensions: 15 cm x 12 cm - holding approximately 50 dice

Name: Velvet Dice Bag - Owl
Description: Soft as a silent wingbeat in the dark, this bag is a tribute to the keepers of hidden knowledge. It is ideal for the wizard or scholar whose dice are as sharp and discerning as a raptor's gaze.
Product Dimensions: 15 cm x 12 cm - holding approximately 50 dice

Item: Bag - Slate Grey Leather Dice Bag
Name: Leather Dice Bag - Slate Grey
Description: Cool and elusive as the morning mist over the Shadowfell, this pouch is designed for those who move unseen. Its neutral, stony finish ensures that while your rolls might be legendary, your presence remains a mystery.
Product Dimensions: 12.5 cm x 10 cm - holding approximately 35 dice

Name: Canvas Dice Bag - White
Description: This pouch is crafted from heavy, bleached sailcloth, reminiscent of the great ships that traverse the Uncharted Seas. It is a clean, sturdy vessel for a cleric’s holy relics or a navigator’s most trusted star-charts—and the dice that guide their way.
Product Material: 100% Heavy-Duty Cotton Duck Canvas  (Exterior and Interior) / Braided Jute (Drawstring)
Product Dimensions: 14 cm x 11 cm - holding approximately 55 dice

Name: Belltower Dice Roller
Description: A soaring spire that echoes with the gravity of fate. As your dice tumble through its heights, imagine the distant tolling of a bronze bell announcing a champion's victory or a hero's fall.
Product Dimensions: 16 cm (H) x 6.5 cm (W) x 6.5 cm (D)

Name: Crumbling Castle Dice Roller
Description: This weathered stone fortress has stood against a thousand sieges. Rolling your dice through its cracked ramparts feels like a desperate gambit during a final stand for the kingdom.
Product Dimensions: 14 cm (H) x 9 cm (W) x 8 cm (D)

Name: Dragons Lair Dice Roller
Description: Cast your dice into the smoking maw of a Great Wyrm’s sanctum. Only those with a true dragon’s hoard of luck will emerge from this scorched stone passage with a critical success.
Product Dimensions: 14 cm (H) x 9 cm (W) x 8 cm (D)

Name: Elvish Tree Dice Roller
Description: Carved from living wood and infused with Sylvan magic, this roller guides your dice through a labyrinth of silver-leafed branches. It is the favored tool of those who walk the path of the High Forest.
Product Dimensions: 17cm (H) x 8cm (W) x 8cm (D)

Name: Lighthouse Dice Roller
Description: A beacon of hope in the storm of battle. This roller provides a steady, guiding path for your dice, cutting through the fog of war to reveal the numbers you need most.
Product Dimensions: 14 cm (H) x 9 cm (W) x 8 cm (D)

Name: Pagoda Dice Roller
Description: A structure of elegant balance and ancient wisdom. It offers a tranquil and disciplined descent for your dice, perfect for the monk or strategist who values precision over brute force.
Product Dimensions: 15 cm (H) x 8.5cm (W) x 8.5cm (D)

Name: Temple of Doom Dice Roller
Description: Dangerous and shrouded in mystery, this roller represents a descent into cursed ruins. Every die that passes through its shadowed halls feels like a narrow escape from a deadly ancient trap.
Product Dimensions: 15 cm (H) x 8.5cm (W) x 8.5cm (D)

Name: Tower Dice Roller
Description: The quintessential bastion of the arcane. This classic stone tower provides a reliable and authoritative tumble, making every roll feel like a decree from a high-seated wizard.
Product Dimensions: 14 cm (H) x 9 cm (W) x 8 cm (D)

Name: Ancient Oak Dice Roller
Description: Gnarled and thick with history, this roller feels as though it was hewn from the oldest tree in the world. It carries the heavy, earthen spirit of the woods into every roll.
Product Dimensions: 17cm (H) x 8cm (W) x 8cm (D)

Description: Encased in polished wood, this vault features intricate carvings of the sun, moon, and stars, designed to hold dice that command the very forces of the cosmos.
